22.heading: Furs.
22.title: "Jack on the Renegade Trail"
22.author: [No author]
22.series: Jack) p. 20-25 in Treasure Chest of Fun and Fact, v. 4, no. 8
notes: "What has gone before: Jack Cheval has joined Landeau and Brave Hawk who are conducting the Indian Chief Limping Rabbit to a good hunting ground. On the way the party discovers that Manitok, a renegade, is planning to steal trader Le Beau's furs. When Jack leaves the party to spy on Manitok he is attacked by a wounded moose."

47.title: The Further Adventures of John Difool
47.author: by Alexandro Jodorowsky ; illustrated by Moebius
47.appears_in: p. 17-24 in Heavy Metal, v. 5, no. 11 (Feb. 1982).
notes: "When last we read, there was a revolution in the buried city. John Difool had no idea that the killer meta baron had been thrown onto his heels by Amok, that infamous corporation of killers and ne'eer-do-wells. While trying to escape through the technos citadel, he found himself a prisoner of the techno-pope. Needless to say, his fine-feathered sidekick, Deepo, is in no better position."
